trans-unit.source: Defines a rectangular brush with a hatch style, a foreground color, and a background color.
trans-unit.target: Define um pincel retangular com uma cor de plano de fundo, uma cor de primeiro plano e um estilo de hachura.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: A hatch pattern is made from two colors: one defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, which fills the background and one for the lines that form the pattern over the background defined by the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um padrão de hachura é feito de duas cores: um definido pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>, que preenche a tela de fundo e uma para as linhas que formam o padrão no plano de fundo definido pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.ForegroundColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.BackgroundColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A> property defines what type of pattern the brush has and can be any value from the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A>propriedade define o tipo de padrão de pincel tem e pode ser qualquer valor entre o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle>enumeração.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush.HatchStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: There are more than fifty elements in the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Há mais de&50; elementos no <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle>enumeração.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle>

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma elipse preenchida com um padrão de hachura horizontal.

trans-unit.source: ![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
trans-unit.target: ![Padrão de hachura](~/add/media/hatch1.png "padrão de hachura")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> enumeration and foreground color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"> </xref> cor de primeiro plano e de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: The background color is initialized to black.
trans-unit.target: A cor de plano de fundo é inicializada para preto.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"> </xref> valores que representa o padrão de desenhada por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor das linhas desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> enumeration, foreground color, and background color.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"> </xref> enumeração, cor de primeiro plano e a cor de plano de fundo.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows an ellipse filled with a horizontal hatch pattern.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra uma elipse preenchida com um padrão de hachura horizontal.

trans-unit.source: ![Hatch Pattern](~/add/media/hatch1.png "Hatch Pattern")
trans-unit.target: ![Padrão de hachura](~/add/media/hatch1.png "padrão de hachura")

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> values that represents the pattern drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"> </xref> valores que representa o padrão de desenhada por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor das linhas desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the color of spaces between the lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor de espaços entre as linhas desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of spaces between the hatch lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor de espaços entre as linhas de hachura desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the background color for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor de plano de fundo para este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia exata desta <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> this method creates, cast as an object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> esse método cria, usado como um objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the color of hatch lines drawn by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cor das linhas de hachura desenhadas por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> structure that represents the foreground color for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> estrutura que representa a cor de primeiro plano para esse <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the hatch style of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de hachura dessa <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"></xref> values that represents the pattern of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchStyle"> </xref> valores que representa o padrão desse <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.HatchBrush"> </xref>.
